goals.title: Lead and contribute to the development of EBS 3.4
goals.measurement: Work with the development team to ensure all tasks are completed successfully. Assist the development team with technical issues as needed. Complete all assigned tasks a resolve assigned bugs. Ensure that the project will meet all milestones defined by the customer towards the successful development of EBS 3.4.

goals.title: Contribute to the successful maintenance of EBS
goals.measurement: Complete assigned tasks to ensure that enhancements to the EBS suite are successfully deployed every 3 months.

goals.title: Migrate Development from LDRNET to C2S
goals.measurement: Contribute to the successful migration of the development environment from LDRNET to C2S as requested by the customer.

achievements.description: Configure Developer workstation with Roles and Features, SQL Server 2014, Visual Studio 2015, MS Office 2010. Verify ability to compile and execute code against DEV-DB01 and local databases.
Configure QA workstation with SQL Server Management Studio and MS Office 2010. Verify ability to connect from SSMS to DEV-DB01 server. Verify ability to browse to EBS applications.
Configure TFS servers in C2S with Roles and Features.  Install SQL Server 2014 on TFS database server.
Configure TFS servers with Roles and Features, Windows patches, SQL Server 2014 and TFS 2015. Restore the BAMOM and BPO TFS databases.
Verify the configuration of "Developer Workstation 2" and confirm that SQL Server 2014 is working when a server is created from an AMI.

goals.title: Provide Tier 3 support for the EBS suite
goals.measurement: Provide support for production issues and successfully implement solutions to ensure customer satisfaction.

achievements.description: NETS ticket number SD1347641 - Update Help OCA script that is used to delete inventory schedules.
BOSS ticket number IM48815 - Write a script to fix LDDT submission counts in Focus LDDT list.

BOSS ticket numbers IM49727, IM49444, IM49642 - Modify the Disposal stored procedure to move property in the inventory submission from disposal cases where the property has been withdrawn over to the submitted inventory schedule.
BOSS ticket numbers IM49443, IM49746 - Fix the calculation of current quantity and acquisition cost when submitting a material inventory schedule.
BOSS ticket number IM48742 - Display the contract number in a draft invoice PDF document when generated from Focus.
BOSS ticket numbers IM48980, IM49432, IM49462, IM49681, IM49659 - Fix the validation of invoice attachment file extensions to be case insensitive.
BOSS ticket number  - Fix script errors in Focus so that it will render properly when a user does not have permissions to the application.
BOSS ticket number  - Write a script to fix Negative Line Item Submissions where the contract does not have active inventory.

goals.title: Development lead for EBS 3.4 Development
goals.measurement: The customer priority changed from the development of EBS 3.4 to applying software currency to EBS 3.3 and then another change in priority to applying software currency to EBS 3.2.
goals.employeeComments: I have been leading the team in the upgrade of 3rd party libraries to EBS 3.3 and then to EBS 3.2.  I have handled the merging of code between the different branches of code within TFS.  The software currency changes have been verified and the team is prepared to deploy the software currency changes on December 16th.
